subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Luke Donald shot a four-under-par 66, Mark Calcavecchia finished with 67, and they wound up tied with Matt Jones (71) atop the leader board at the Honda Classic in Palm Beach Gardens, Fla. Donald, Calcavecchia and Jones were at six-under, one shot better than Brian Davis (73) and José Coceres (68).
